refnamediv.refpurpose: Read a portion from a ringbuffer relative to the currently set marker position

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, data] = ld_relread_ringbuf(sim, events, ident_str, datatype, ElementsToRead, relPos)

para.para: datatype - ORTD datatype of the ringbuffer (for now only ORTD.DATATYPE_FLOAT)
ElementsToRead (integer) - number of elements to read from the ringbuffer
relPos - UINT - position relative to the currently set marker to start reading from
